summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4360 for the improvement of Frontenac Street from Rainier Avenue to a point about 190 feet west of the west margin of 48th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51639, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
